allow:
Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
Replace Mermaid with PlantUML diagrams and PNG exports

- Add PlantUML source files for all 5 diagrams with matching colour scheme
- Export PNG images for Bitbucket and Confluence compatibility
- Update COMPONENT-TESTING.md to reference PNG images
- Move Mermaid versions to docs/diagrams/mermaid/ as fallback

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.6 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")

postToolUse.command: bash -c 'if git diff --name-only HEAD | grep -q \.java$; then mvn compile -q 2>&1 | tail -5; fi'
